item.title: Working in Python and R with Reticulate
item.description: library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyr) library(reticulate) use_python("/usr/local/bin/python3") Tidying in R After spending quite a bit of time tidying in R this semester, I prefer tidying in R but still prefer to do analysis more programatically. iris2 <- iris %>% select(Species) %>% pull() Interpreting in Python Here I am using Python to do a basic demo of intepretation in Python
